title: LSU students present AI solutions for local industry
description: LSU students developed artificial intelligence solutions for Baton Rouge-area industries and presented them to sponsors Monday night as part of the College of Engineering’s AI Showcase.
content:
Overlooking Tiger Stadium and the Mississippi River, students in LSU’s artificial intelligence capstone course presented their business-focused AI solutions to industry partners in the Baton Rouge area.

title: Microsoft investing $17.5 billion in India for AI and cloud infrastructure
description: Microsoft on Tuesday announced its biggest-ever Asia investment, amounting to $17.5 billion, in India over the next four years to advance the country’s cloud and artificial intelligence infrastructure. title: AI earns high marks in law school grading
description: Artificial intelligence is pretty good at taking law school exams, according to a growing body of research. Should it be used to grade them?
content:
Dec 9 (Reuters) - Artificial intelligence is pretty good at taking law school exams, according to a growing body of research. Should it be used to grade them?

title: San Francisco 49ers: Stake sale to OpenAI chair values NFL team at $9bn
description: The San Francisco 49ers have been valued at more than $9bn after the chairman of artificial intelligence behemoth OpenAI agreed to acquire a stake in the NFL franchise.
content:

title: Data centres: Office towers v Bunnings sheds
description: Demand for data centres to power the artificial intelligence boom is surging, but there is debate over the best way to deliver.

title: Trump approves sale of advanced Nvidia AI chips for approved Chinese customers
description: President Donald Trump says he will allow Nvidia to sell its H200 computer chip used in the development of artificial intelligence to “approved customers” in China
content:

description: The 10,000-square-foot exhibit uses digital projection, artificial intelligence and special effects to introduce visitors to the life of Jesus as depicted in the Gospels.

title: Howard Marks Says AI Is ‘Terrifying’ for Jobs, Queries Debt Cost
description: Artificial intelligence has created a “terrifying” outlook for employment, Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks cautioned, and an assumed productivity boom fails to consider how many people will be able to afford the additional goods produced.
